channel.title: Recreating Robert Miles - Children
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/jA1l0HFJY1aCTshzPgR8ng==
Just working on the first 16 bars of this legendary song is enough to make me go crazy. But then again, I am reminded that I'm working on this past my normal bedtime by around 3 hours.
**[If you haven't heard the original song/wanted a refresher](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QwqmJilXxJY)**
For me, I plan to recreate the Club Radio Edit, or the 4 Clubbers version, which if you haven't heard, [sounds like this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfSkpAdDhZ8). I chose this version because sounds much more interesting in my ears. If you want me to recreate the original version, feel free to tell me.
